# Commit Message Guidelines

## Template

**Summary:**  
Short description of the change. Including feature/fix/chore and a brief detail.

**Adjusted Files:**  
- `file/path/one.dart`
- `file/path/two.dart`

**What Was Changed:**  
- List the main code changes (e.g., refactored BLoC logic, updated feature flags, added error tracking).

**Purpose:**  
- Explain why the change was made (e.g., improve maintainability, fix bug, enable/disable feature).

**Architectural Double-Check:**  
- Confirm adherence to BLoC pattern and project structure.
- Note any impact on business logic, UI, or state management.
- Mention if documentation or tests were updated.

**Validation:**  
- [ ] Ran `flutter run`
- [ ] Ran `flutter test`
- [ ] Ran `dart format .`
- [ ] Ran `dart analyze`
